Key Match Events: Ja Morant got his teammates involved, kick-starting career nights for forward Jay Huff and guard Scotty Pippen Jr.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ja Morant's energy was infectious in the Grizzlies' 124-111 home-opening win over the Orlando Magic.
Others: Ja Morant finished with a double-double, scoring 16 points with 10 assists.
